beers.name: Lagunitas IPA
beers.description: A well-rounded, highly drinkable IPA with hints of citrus and floral notes.

beers.name: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale
beers.description: A classic pale ale known for its piney and citrusy hop character.

beers.name: Guinness Draught
beers.description: A rich, creamy stout with hints of coffee and chocolate.

beers.name: Heineken
beers.description: A crisp, refreshing lager with mild bitterness and a slightly sweet finish.

beers.name: Hoegaarden
beers.description: A light and refreshing Belgian wheat beer with notes of orange peel and coriander.

beers.name: Duvel
beers.description: A strong, golden ale with a complex blend of fruity, spicy, and hoppy flavors.
